text: @chuckwoolery And sadly, you are still kicking. Odd 4 your age group in regards to this virus. Have you seen the fatality rate for covid19 in your age group? I really don't understand conspiracy theories. I "can say whatever I want and people will believe me, even though there is no evidence".
